Caption: Figure 1: (a) A single user is performing an analysis of Glass dataset (214 × 9 matrix) using iPCA. (b) Multiple users are interactively col- laborating on a multi-touch table using iPCA-CE.

Figure 2: An illustration of users’ processes of solving complex an- alytical problems and sharing analysis results (findings), including (1) asynchronous self-sharing in a desktop environment, (2) syn- chronous sharing in a collaborative environment, and (3 and 4) asyn- chronous transitional sharing processes between environments.
